chamillionaire: listen.. they say rappings a waste of knowledge take ya ass to college now they broke ass call us tryin to ask for dollars sittin behing glass impalas high class impalas i make two cash deposits everytime i pass the closet if niggas lookin for the grands the grands can be spotted chamillions the man he got it in his hand of wallet aint no ifs ands about it that mans the hottest i accedently spent five grand cause man we ballas we dont shop at family dollars if your ice is fake if you ask me for a verse i make my price inflate we still ghetto lookin for some metal mics to break im still hangin around a hood like a liscense plate im not cappin cause trust me youll know when im cappin when i pull out that gat and you hear that thang click-clackin you hear what that boy said dont be a hard head save me some left overs im through with some raw bread
